languages.text: "Разумное замечание. Хорошо, оповести служителей культа, что я готов{mf||а} принять их".
"You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."
languages.original_text: "Разумное замечание. Хорошо, оповести служителей культа, что я готов{mf||а} принять их".

traits.locale_text: "Fair enough. All right, inform the cultists that I am willing to receive them."
"Fair enough. All right, inform the cultists that I am willing to receive them."
"You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."
"You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."
"You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."
"You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."

languages.text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Très bien, faites savoir aux cultistes que je vais les recevoir. »
languages.original_text: "You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'avez pas tort. Très bien, faites savoir aux cultistes que je vais les recevoir. »

languages.text: «Tiene razón. De acuerdo, informe a los cultistas de que los recibiré».
languages.original_text: "You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."

traits.locale_text: «Tiene razón. De acuerdo, informe a los cultistas de que los recibiré».

languages.text: “你的话很有道理。好吧，告诉那些教派成员，说我愿意见他们一面。”
languages.original_text: "You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."

traits.locale_text: “你的话很有道理。好吧，告诉那些教派成员，说我愿意见他们一面。”

languages.text: 「あなたは正しい。魔女団に情報を伝えてください。彼らを歓迎します」
languages.original_text: "You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは正しい。魔女団に情報を伝えてください。彼らを歓迎します」

languages.text: "Ein verflucht gutes Argument. Also schön, sagt den Kultisten, dass ich sie empfangen werde."
languages.original_text: "You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."

traits.locale_text: "Ein verflucht gutes Argument. Also schön, sagt den Kultisten, dass ich sie empfangen werde."

languages.text: "Güzel bir noktaya değindin. Pekâlâ, kendileriyle görüşeceğime dair tarikatçıları bilgilendir."
languages.original_text: "You make a good point. Very well, inform the cultists that I will receive them."
